about_the_game:
The Story

The Flame forges the threads of destiny. An epic adventure story set in an incredible fantasy world. In the role of a young hero, the player is expected to explore mysterious dungeons, travel through a breathtaking world, fight dangerous enemies and face an ancient magic.

The Hero’s Path

Wicked signs in the sky. An arcane prophecy promises the inevitable. The world is waiting for a hero who can overcome an ancient evil.

Key Features

  • Incredible Adventure: Start on an exciting journey full of mystery and danger.

  • A New Experience: A story that grips you and doesn't let you go until the very end.

  • Exploration: Ancient temples and mysterious dungeons. Interact with the world, solve puzzles and get rewards.

  • Fight: Dynamic battles with enemies. Upgrade equipment and learn magic to win.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD FX-6100/Intel i3-3220 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R7 360 2GB/NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti 2GB or better
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600X/Intel i7-6700K or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX Vega 56 8GB/ Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 8GB or better
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

short_description: Running away from persecution, the hero arrives to a small province. But he is pulled into the stream of massive events, on which depends the destiny of the world. Apparently, the ancient prophecy is about to come true. Will the young hero be strong and brave enough to face the forces of evil?
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Russian, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
